1.title: Ex-Bestie Baggage
1.plot: Seven former friends are paired up to compete for the chance to win $100,000. They will soon realize their Ex BFF is their team mate, and they must pick up their old baggage and race to their new house to stay in the game.

2.title: Worst. Night. Ever.
2.plot: Ex-Besties settle in, Melanie and Ashonti confide in other teams regarding a shocking incident that ultimately ended their friendship. Sibley surprises the teams with a fun night out, that quickly turns into the worst night ever.

3.title: Survival of the Fittest
3.plot: Laura Whitmore hosts as a team of girls and a team of boys face off in the ultimate battle of the sexes under the African sun

4.title: Run for Your Money
4.plot: Still reeling from last week's "house meeting," the drama continues when the Ex-Besties travel to Santa Anita Race Track for a challenge, and their faith in their teammate is put to the test.

5.title: K-Town Run Around
5.plot: The house has to rise above their late night fight with team Jenika because they're headed into their grossest challenge yet! Set in LA's Koreatown our Ex-Besties end up proving again that communication is key on the road to $100K.

6.title: What a Beach
6.plot: At Venice Beach our Besties have a chance to rescue their friendships, and sabotage their competitors. For the first time #KChris fears being at the bottom, while #Jenika lets internal conflict, and lack of communication derail them.

7.title: Muddy Buddies
7.plot: Teams are faced with their dirtiest challenge yet as they traverse an obstacle course on a muddy ranch. Emotions run high, Melanie has a breakdown, and Ashonti melts down over the potential of losing the grand prize.

8.title: Roll of a Lifetime
8.plot: The remaining four teams of Ex-Besties square off in their most difficult challenge yet. The team that can truly bury their beef, and work together will be crowned champion of the "Battle of the Ex-Besties"!

imdb.plot outline: A $100,000 prize is on the line for seven pairs of former BFFs in this competition series that forces them to put past differences behind them to have a shot at winning the life-changing prize. The duos compete in a series of challenges. If a team loses a challenge, its members have the choice to compete for $50,000 or leave the competition. Losing two consecutive challenges gets rid of that option and results in immediate elimination. It is up to the contestants to determine if the potential payout is worth the betrayals, lies and past accusations they have to put up with while working with their former friends.
imdb.title: Battle of the Ex-Besties
plot: Seven former friends are paired up to compete for the chance to win $100,000. They will soon realize their Ex BFF is their team mate, and they must pick up their old baggage and race to their new house to stay in the game.
